name: EZ-Bar Curl
description: 1. Using an EZ-bar grasp the bar with an underhand grip at desired width with palms angled slightly inwards 2. Let the bar hang down in front of your body at arms length 3. Without moving your upper arms or torso bend your elbows lifting the bar up towards your shoulders/chest 4. Slowly return the weight to start position and repeat for desired reps
